InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S5 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 5

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: Revenant Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Apocalypse Arms
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 4

If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it. And if you want it broke, aim a Revenant at it. Solidly built on a foundation of centuries-old tech, Apocalypse Arms puts an innovative spin on battle-tested designs to create a rugged ballistic Gatling that can steadily hurtle death across the void. Though it’s slow to spin up and cool down, the Revenant’s dependability makes it a favorite for those expecting to find trouble.

InstalledItem.Name: BRVS Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Ballistic Repeater
Size: 2

Only Vanguard owners can equip this unique version of Behring's line of ballistic repeaters to the nose of their ship. The BRVS is carefully calibrated so its ballistic barrage would fire fast enough to provide maximum target saturation while its improved venting reduces frequent overheating.

InstalledItem.Name: BRVS Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:

Size: 2

InstalledItem.Name: SW16BR2 “Sawbuck” Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Ballistic Repeater
Size: 2

The SW16BR2 Sawbuck is Behring’s contribution to the expanding Ballistic Repeater market. Its sequential-firing double barrel configuration offers an effective middle-ground for operators looking for a higher rate of fire than a cannon, but without the fear of overheating that you would get with a gatling.

InstalledItem.Name: SW16BR2 “Sawbuck” Repeater

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-442 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 4xS2

Behring’s MSD-442 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of four S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Dominator II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Talon
Tracking Signal: Electromagnetic
Size: 2

Designed to track an opponent’s electromagnetic signature, the Dominator strike missile is a precision ordnance package designed to establish tactical battlefield dominance.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.

Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

This military-grade component has been put through the paces by the UEE Navy, so you know the Maelstrom can handle the havoc of battle.

InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

Providing the kind of durability that made Aegis products a mainstay with the military, the Arctic is an economic mil-spec cooler capable of withstanding the rigors of combat without sacrificing performance.

InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Wei-Tek 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

Wei-Tek has marketed the Crossfield specifically to target military personnel and veteran pilots who will appreciate the stats that the mil-spec quantum drive offers.

InstalledItem.Name: Chernykh
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Chernykh is named after the famed 26th century engineer who designed some of the most prized radars of that era. This medium radar from WillsOp celebrates both the look and performance of those classic components.
